"What is (are) short stature, hyperextensibility, hernia, ocular depression, Rieger anomaly, and teething delay ?","Short stature, hyperextensibility, hernia, ocular depression, Rieger anomaly, and teething delay, commonly known by the acronym SHORT syndrome, is a rare disorder that affects many parts of the body.
